SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The AbstractDAO class provides a generic implementation for accessing and manipulating database tables.
App
The main class that serves as the entry point for the application.
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
Bill
The Bill class represents a bill object that contains information about a specific bill in the system.
BillBLL
The BillBLL class represents the business logic for handling Bill operations.
BillDAO
The BillDAO class is responsible for accessing and manipulating the Bill data in the database.
Client
The Client class represents a client object that contains information about a specific client in the system.
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class represents the business logic for handling Client operations.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class is responsible for accessing and manipulating the Client data in the database.
ClientView
The ClientView class represents the graphical user interface for managing clients.
Controller
The Controller class handles the interactions between the user interface components and the application logic.
ControllerClient
The ControllerClient class handles the interactions between the ClientView and the ClientBLL.
ControllerOrder
The ControllerOrder class handles the interactions between the OrderView and the business layer classes.
ControllerProduct
The ControllerProduct class handles the interactions between the ProductView and the business layer components.
Menu
The Menu class represents the main menu of the application's graphical user interface (GUI).
NameValidator
The NameValidator class is responsible for validating the name of a Client.
Order
The Order class represents an order in the system.
OrderBLL
The OrderBLL class represents the business logic for handling Order operations.
OrderDAO
The OrderDAO class is responsible for accessing and manipulating the Order data in the database.
OrderView
The OrderView class represents the view for managing orders in the application's graphical user interface (GUI).
PriceValidator
The PriceValidator class is responsible for validating the price of a Product.
Product
The Product class represents a product in the system.
ProductBLL
The ProductBLL class represents the business logic for handling Product operations.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class is responsible for accessing and manipulating the Product data in the database.
ProductView
The ProductView class represents the view for managing products in the application's graphical user interface (GUI).
QuantityValidator
The QuantityValidator class is responsible for validating the quantity of an Order.
StockValidator
The StockValidator class is responsible for validating the stock of a Product.
Validator<T>
The Validator interface defines a contract for validating objects.
